questions.title: The One-Liner (What do you do?)
questions.prompt: Explain what your company does in one or two clear, jargon-free sentences. Who are your users and what problem do you solve?
followups: Can you say that without using the words 'platform', 'AI', or 'blockchain'?
Would my parents understand what you just said?
What is the specific job-to-be-done for your customer?

questions.title: The Problem
questions.prompt: What specific problem are you solving? How do you know it's a real problem?
followups: Who has this problem today? Be specific.
How are people solving this problem right now (without your product)?
What is the 'before' state for your user?

questions.title: Your Progress So Far
questions.prompt: What have you built so far? What is your current status?
followups: Do you have a demo you can show us right now?
When did you start working on this?
What did you launch with?

questions.title: The Vision (10 Years)
questions.prompt: If you are wildly successful, what does this company look like in 10 years?
followups: What is the headline you want to read about your company?
How big can this be?
Why does this need to exist as a company?

questions.title: Why Now?
questions.prompt: Why is this the exact right time to start this company? Why hasn't it been built before?
followups: What has changed in the last 2-3 years to make this possible?
Is it technology, consumer behavior, or regulation?
Why didn't Google/Amazon/Facebook do this 5 years ago?

questions.title: The Team (Roles)
questions.prompt: Who is on the team and what does each person focus on?
followups: How did you meet?
How long have you known each other?
What is the equity split and why?

questions.title: Full-time Commitment
questions.prompt: Is everyone on the team working on this full-time?
followups: If not, when will you be full-time?
What are you leaving behind to do this?
What is your burn rate?

questions.title: Users (If Launched)
questions.prompt: How many users do you have?
followups: How many are active today? This week?
Where do new users come from?
What is your week-over-week growth rate?

questions.title: Revenue (If Monetizing)
questions.prompt: How much revenue are you generating?
followups: What is your Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR)?
Who is paying you?
How did you land your first customer?

questions.title: Why YC?
questions.prompt: Why are you applying to Y Combinator specifically?
followups: What do you hope to get out of the program?
What is the biggest gap in your knowledge right now?
What does success look like for you after 3 months in the batch?
